title: The French Connection
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Leading Role
Best Writing, Screenplay Based on Material from Another Medium
description: A pair of NYPD detectives in the Narcotics Bureau stumble onto a heroin smuggling ring based in Marseilles, but stopping them and capturing their leaders proves an elusive goal.

title: A Clockwork Orange
description: In the future, a sadistic gang leader is imprisoned and volunteers for a conduct-aversion experiment, but it doesn't go as planned.

title: The Last Picture Show
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Supporting Role
Best Actress in a Supporting Role
description: In 1951, a group of high schoolers come of age in a bleak, isolated, atrophied North Texas town that is slowly dying, both culturally and economically.

title: Fiddler on the Roof
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring Adaptation and Original Song Score
description: In pre-revolutionary Russia, a Jewish peasant with traditional values contends with marrying off three of his daughters with modern romantic ideals while growing anti-Semitic sentiment threatens his village.

title: Dirty Harry
description: When a madman calling himself "the Scorpio Killer" menaces the city, tough-as-nails San Francisco Police Inspector "Dirty" Harry Callahan is assigned to track down and craze the psychopath.

title: Willy Wonka & the Chocolate Factory
description: A poor but hopeful boy seeks one of the five coveted golden tickets that will send him on a tour of Willy Wonka's mysterious chocolate factory.

title: Harold and Maude
description: Young, rich, and obsessed with death, Harold finds himself changed forever when he meets lively septuagenarian Maude at a funeral.

title: McCabe & Mrs. Miller
description: A gambler and a prostitute become business partners in a remote Old West mining town, and their enterprise thrives until a large corporation arrives on the scene.

title: Straw Dogs
description: A young American mathematician and his English wife come to the English countryside and face increasingly vicious local harassment.

title: The Devils
description: In 17th-century France, a priest stands in the way of Cardinal Richelieu's influence, but the Cardinal finds an easy target when the priest is accused of witchcraft by a convent of sexually repressed nuns.

title: Walkabout
description: Two white children, lost in the Australian outback, are saved by an Aboriginal boy on "walkabout", a ritual separation from his tribe.

title: Klute
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Leading Role
description: A small-town detective searching for a missing man has only one lead: a connection with a New York prostitute.

title: Get Carter
description: When his brother dies under mysterious circumstances in a car accident, London gangster Jack Carter travels to Newcastle to investigate.

title: Duel
description: A business commuter is pursued and terrorized by the malevolent driver of a massive tractor-trailer.

title: Two-Lane Blacktop
description: Two men drag-race across the U.S. in a '55 Chevy. Along the way, they pick up a girl and challenge a man in a GTO to a race to Washington, D.C.

title: Vanishing Point
description: During the 1970s, a car delivery driver, Kowalski, delivers hot rods in record time, but one run turns into a pursuit by the police.

title: Wake in Fright
description: A schoolteacher is stranded in a small, violent town in the Australian outback, where he descends into self-destruction.

title: The Andromeda Strain
description: A team of top scientists work feverishly in a secret, state-of-the-art laboratory to discover what has killed the citizens of a small town and learn how this deadly contagion can be stopped.

title: Play Misty for Me
description: A brief fling between a male disc jockey and an obsessed female fan takes a frightening, and possibly deadly turn when another woman enters the picture.

title: The Beguiled
description: While imprisoned in a Confederate girls' boarding school, an injured Union soldier cons his way into each of the lonely women's hearts, causing them to turn on each other, and eventually, on him.

title: Big Jake
description: The McCandles gang murders the family of John Fain's ranch foreman, and kidnaps John's grandson. John Fain, an aging rancher, goes after them.

title: 10 Rillington Place
description: Based on the true story of British serial killer John Christie and the innocent man executed for his crimes.

title: The Panic in Needle Park
description: A bleak look at the lives of heroin addicts who hang out in "Needle Park" in New York City.

title: Sunday Bloody Sunday
description: A sophisticated London doctor and a divorcee in her 30s are both having an affair with the same younger man.

title: The Hospital
oscars_won_details: Best Writing, Story and Screenplay Based on Factual Material or Material Not Previously Published or Produced
description: The life of a suicidal chief of medicine in a large metropolitan hospital is complicated by the arrival of a patient's daughter and a serial killer stalking the wards.

title: Bananas
production_studio: Jack Rollins & Charles H. Joffe Productions
description: When a bumbling New Yorker is dumped by his activist girlfriend, he travels to a tiny Latin American nation and becomes involved in its latest rebellion.

title: A New Leaf
description: A spoiled and self-centered man who has blown his inheritance resolves to marry a wealthy woman for her money.

title: Duck, You Sucker!
description: An I.R.A. explosives expert on the run in Mexico meets an amoral Mexican bandit; together they are drawn into the Mexican Revolution.

title: Trafic
description: Monsieur Hulot is a car designer who attempts to drive his new camper-car from Paris to the Amsterdam Auto Show, encountering numerous mishaps along the way.

title: Murmur of the Heart
description: In 1954 France, a precocious teenager's close relationship with his mother borders on incest.

title: Death in Venice
description: While recovering in Venice, sickly composer Gustav von Aschenbach becomes dangerously obsessed with a beautiful teenage boy.

title: The Decameron
description: An adaptation of nine stories from Boccaccio's 'The Decameron'.

title: A Touch of Zen
description: A lady fugitive is on the run from corrupt government officials and is joined by an unambitious painter and skilled Buddhist monks.

title: Mon Oncle Antoine
description: In a small Quebec mining town during the 1940s, a teenage boy comes of age under the tutelage of his uncle, the local undertaker and general store owner.

title: Johnny Got His Gun
description: A young American soldier is hit by a mortar shell on the last day of World War I. He lies in a hospital bed as a quadruple amputee who has lost his eyes, ears, mouth and nose.

title: The Abominable Dr. Phibes
description: A doctor, scientist, organist, and biblical scholar, Anton Phibes, seeks revenge on the nine doctors he considers responsible for his wife's death.

title: Bedknobs and Broomsticks
description: An apprentice witch, three kids and a cynical magician search for the missing component to a magic spell to be used in the defense of Britain in World War II.

title: Summer of '42
description: In 1942, a teenage boy falls in love with a beautiful woman whose husband has gone off to fight in WWII.

title: Mary, Queen of Scots
description: Mary Stuart, Queen of Scots, attempts to overthrow her cousin Elizabeth I, Queen of England, only to find herself condemned to years of imprisonment and facing execution.

title: Nicholas and Alexandra
description: The story of the last ruling Romanovs of Russia, from the birth of their hemophiliac son and heir to their execution in the Ural Mountains.

title: Taking Off
description: After their teenage daughter runs away, a suburban couple's search for her leads them to meet other parents of runaway children.

title: The Emigrants
description: During the mid-19th Century, a struggling farming family in Sweden decides to embark on the arduous journey to America.

title: The Big Boss
description: A young man sworn to an oath of non-violence works with his cousins in an ice factory where they mysteriously begin to disappear.

title: Four Nights of a Dreamer
description: A young man saves a woman from suicide and they meet over four nights to share their stories of love and loss.

title: Minnie and Moskowitz
description: A museum curator falls in love with a crazy parking lot attendant.

title: The Go-Between
description: In 1900 Norfolk, a young boy acts as a messenger between a farmer and the daughter of the wealthy family he is staying with, unaware of the implications of their illicit affair.

title: Family Life
description: A young woman is driven into mental illness by her well-meaning but misguided parents.

title: Punishment Park
description: A pseudo-documentary covering a detention camp in the California desert where political dissidents are given the option of facing a long prison sentence or spending three days in Punishment Park.

title: Sacco & Vanzetti
description: In 1920s Massachusetts, two Italian anarchists are accused of murder and put on trial in a case that drew international attention due to perceived prejudice.

title: The Tragedy of Macbeth
description: A graphically violent adaptation of Shakespeare's play about a Scottish lord who murders his king to take the throne.

title: Sometimes a Great Notion
description: A family of independent Oregon loggers struggle to keep the family business alive amidst changing times and a local strike.

title: Carnal Knowledge
description: Two lifelong friends share a cynical view of women and a competitive nature that strains their relationship over decades.

title: Little Murders
description: A nihilistic photographer and an optimistic girl try to maintain a relationship amidst the urban chaos, random violence, and apathy of New York City.
